img.title: Alberich's Pointed Hat
img.alt: alberichs pointed hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Albinauric Mask
img.alt: albinauric mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td:
+4 Arcane,
reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears

ul.li:
Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Ascend the stairs to the top floor of the building. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to a balcony, then enter a room with an Omenkiller, the Albinauric Staff, and the Albinauric Mask.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: All-Knowing Helm
img.alt: all knowing helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. He is fought in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Aristocrat Hat
img.alt: aristocrat hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Soldier Aristocrats that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.

img.title: Aristocraft Headband
img.alt: aristocrat headband elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Rare chance to drop from Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.
Easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins, south of the Road to the Manor site of grace.

img.title: Astrologer Hood
img.alt: astrologer hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class

Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Ash-of-war Scarab
img.alt: ash of war scarab elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, Increases damage taken

ul.li:
Behind the waygate on the Limgrave Tower Bridge that takes you to the Divine Tower of Limgrave on a broken section of the bridge.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Azur's Glintstone Crown
img.alt: azurs glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Raises the potency of Azur's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.

ul.li:
The complete Azur's Glintstone Set is found at Azur's location after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline where you side with her.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Bandit Mask
img.alt: bandit mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.

Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in North Limgrave for 1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Banished Knight Helm
img.alt: banished knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

img.title: Beast Champion Helm
img.alt: beast champion helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The entire Beast Champion Set drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. Either defeat him at Warmaster's Shack or defeat the Recusant Bernahl invasion in Crumbling Farum Azula. Location in Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Black Knife Hood
img.alt: black knife hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The entire Black Knife Set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Blackflame Monk Hood
img.alt: blackflame monk hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Blackflame Monks

img.title: Bloodhound Knight Helm
img.alt: bloodhound knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set is dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup in the Gelmir Hero's Grave. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Bloodsoaked Mask
img.alt: bloodsoaked mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.
Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Blue Cloth Cowl
img.alt: blue cloth cowl elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.

Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria)
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Briar Helm
img.alt: briar helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces.

ul.li: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

img.title: Bull-Goat Helm
img.alt: bull goat helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Carian Knight Helm
img.alt: carian knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: From the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace, travel to the rotating lift section. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue. The entire Carian Knight Set is found at the foot of that statue..

img.title: Chain Coif
img.alt: chain coif

ul.li:
Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal√©. It costs 1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Cleanrot Helm
img.alt: cleanrot helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by Cleanrot Knights in the Swamp of Aeonia, The Shaded Castle, or Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

img.title: Champion Headband
img.alt: champion headband elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.

Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Commoner's Headband
img.alt: commoners headband elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The Commoner's Headband is found on a corpse in Mt. Gelmir. After the Temple of Eiglay site of grace, take the elevator up and jump off the outside balcony into the area below. Follow the path past the Abductor Virgin into the window of the manor. Continue until you are on a walkway overlooking the lake the lava lake with Serpent statues on the right side. The Commoner's Headpiece is on a corpse on the head of the second statue.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Confessor Hood
img.alt: confessor hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.

Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Crimson Hood
img.alt: crimson hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Stormveil Castle: It is found where the Chrysalids' Memento was initially found after unlocking Spirit Tuning.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Crucible Axe Helm
img.alt: crucible axe helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations

ul.li: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. Elden Ring Map Link.

img.title: crucible-tree-helm-head-armor-elden-ring-wiki-guide
img.alt: crucible tree helm head armor elden ring wiki guide

tr.td: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations

ul.li:
The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Eccentric's Hood
img.alt: eccentrics hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire Eccentric Set is obtained from choosing to kill Witch-Hunter Jerren at the end of Sorceress Sellen's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Elden Lord Crown
img.alt: elden lord crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be purchased from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

img.title: Exile Hood
img.alt: exile hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drop from Castle Guard.

img.title: Fia's Hood
img.alt: fias hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

img.title: fingerprint-helm
img.alt: fingerprint helm

ul.li:
Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Finger Maiden Fillet
img.alt: finger maiden fillet elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Fire Monk Hood
img.alt: fire monk hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

img.title: Foot Soldier Cap
img.alt: foot soldier cap elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by enemy Foot Soldiers across the game.

img.title: Foiot Soldier Helmet
img.alt: foot soldier helmet elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by Foot Soldiers in Liurnia of the Lakes.

img.title: Gelmir Knight Helm
img.alt: gelmir knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Godrick Knight Helm
img.alt: godrick knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knights scattered across Limgrave.

img.title: godrick_soldier_helm_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: godrick soldier helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

img.title: Godskin Apostle Hood
img.alt: godskin apostle hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Greathelm
img.alt: greathelm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,800 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Great Horned Headband
img.alt: great horned headband elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Ancestral Follower in Siofra River

img.title: Guilty Hood
img.alt: guilty hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

Can be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Haligtree Helm
img.alt: haligtree helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

img.title: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
img.alt: hierodas glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Found on a corpse behind a house on the south side of the village.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Highwayman Hood
img.alt: highwayman hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by a Bandit at Murkwater Cave

img.title: Hoslow's Helm
img.alt: hoslows helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Imp Head (Cat)
img.alt: imp head (cat) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found on a corpse inside the Impaler's Catacombs.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Imp Head (Corpse)
img.alt: imp head (corpse) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Looted from a corpse in an alley off the avenue in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Imp Head (Elder)
img.alt: imp head (elder) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: imp_head_(fanged)_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: imp head (fanged) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Rare drop from Imps

img.title: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
img.alt: imp head (long tongued) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be looted off of Imps in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

img.title: Imp Head (Wolf)
img.alt: imp head (wolf) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be found in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs within Caelid on a body laying over a sarcophagus.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Iron Helmet
img.alt: iron helmet elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Incantation Scarab
img.alt: incantation scarab elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly reduces the FP cost of incantations, Increases damage taken

ul.li:
Need to examine the Homing Instinct Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Juvenile Scholar Cap
img.alt: juvenile scholar cap elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire Juvenile Scholar Set and a Larval Tear is obtained by completing the Resurrection Painting puzzle.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Kaiden Helm
img.alt: kaiden helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Kaiden Sellsword enemies. They can be found east of Limgrave's lake.

img.title: Karolos Glintstone Crown
img.alt: karolos glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, head out the door and hug the western wall, ignoring the broken staircase or any open doorways. A crystal crab is hiding in the corner near the cliff edge.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Knight Helm
img.alt: knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

a.title: Elden Ring Land of Reeds Helm

img.title: Land of Reeds Helm
img.alt: land of reeds helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.

Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Leyndell Knight Helm
img.alt: leyndell knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

img.title: Lionel's Helm
img.alt: lionels helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Lionel's Armor Set is found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Malformed Dragon Helm
img.alt: malformed dragon helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Maliketh's Blade
img.alt: malikeths helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

img.title: Marais Mask
img.alt: marais mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Marionette Soldier Helm
img.alt: marionette soldier helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Marionette Soldiers often found at Liurnia of the Lakes or Mt. Gelmir.

img.title: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
img.alt: marionette soldier birdhelm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped from winged Marionette Soldiers.

img.title: Mask of Confidence
img.alt: mask of confidence elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Mushroom Crown
img.alt: mushroom crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot

ul.li:
Found on a corpse hanging off of a pillar ruin in the south-eastern corner of Lake of Rot. Climb around the outside of the ruin to reach it.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Mushroom Head
img.alt: mushroom head elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Navy Hood
img.alt: navy hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The Navy Hood along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.
Elden Ring Map here.

a.title: Elden Ring Night Maiden Twin Crown

img.title: Night Maiden Twin Crown
img.alt: night maiden twin crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.

Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

img.title: Nox Mirrorhelm
img.alt: nox mirrorhelm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Octopus Head
img.alt: octopus head elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Found by killing Land Octopus or Giant Land Octopus
There are dozens of them south-west of Temple Quarter site of grace

img.title: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
img.alt: olivinus glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, turn left and head to the room at the end of the corridor. Attack the empty bookshelf to reveal a hidden passage. Head out, turn left, and then jump up the rocks to find this item on a corpse.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Omensmirk Mask
img.alt: omensmirk mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by Omensmirk and wearing mask outside of Lower Capital Church Site of Grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Page Hoood
img.alt: page hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Drops from Page enemies.

img.title: Perfumer Hood
img.alt: perfumer hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

img.title: Preceptor's Big Hat
img.alt: preceptors big hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Prisoner Iron Mask
img.alt: prisoner iron mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.

Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Prophet Blindfold
img.alt: prophet blindfold elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.

Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Pumpkin Helm
img.alt: pumpkin helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.

ul.li:
Dropped by Pumpkin Head. Can be found in Castle Morne's courtyard, [Elden Ring Map here] or at Waypoint Ruins.
[Elden Ring Map here]

img.title: Radahn's Redmane Helm
img.alt: radahns redmane helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

img.title: Raging Wolf Helm
img.alt: raging wolf helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Queen's Crescent Crown
img.alt: queens crescent crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The Queen's Crescent Crown Helm can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000
Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

img.title: Radiant Gold Mask
img.alt: radiant gold mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found on collapsed bridge NW of Writheblood Ruins. Drop down two times heading south and it is on a body.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Rotten Duelist Helm
img.alt: rotten duelist helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes

ul.li:
Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Ruler's Mask
img.alt: rulers mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The Ruler's Mask Helm can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Robe.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Sage Hood
img.alt: sage hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Silver Tear Mask
img.alt: silver tear mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by the Mimic Tear boss in Nokron, Eternal City.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Scaled Helm
img.alt: scaled helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Shining Horned Headband
img.alt: shining horned headband elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Chance to drop from Ancestral Follower Shaman, which can be found singing in the Ancestral Woods in Siofra River.
The Ancestral Woods area is only available after gaining access to Nokron, Eternal City.

img.title: Snow Witch Hat
img.alt: snow witch hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the progression of Ranni's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Traveler's Hat
img.alt: travelers hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Traevling Maiden Hood
img.alt: traveling maiden hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Twinned Helm
img.alt: twinned helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.
Elden Ring Map here
Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

img.title: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
img.alt: twinsage glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by a crab in Raya Lucaria Academy. Very close to Azur's Glintstone Staff.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Vagabond Knight Helm
img.alt: vagabond knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.

Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Veteran's Helm
img.alt: veterans helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

img.title: Vulgar Militia Helm
img.alt: vulgar militia helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies.

img.title: Zamor Mask
img.alt: zamor mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Glintstone Scarab
img.alt: glintstone scarab elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly reduces the FP cost of Sorceries, Increases damage taken

ul.li:
Found inside a chest in Raya Lucaria Academy, past the Iron Ball Trap.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Cerulean Tear Scarab
img.alt: cerulean tear scarab elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears, but increases damage taken.

ul.li:
Sellia, Town of Sorcery in Caelid. Found on a corpse on top of a roof in the northeast section of town. Requires platforming across the rooftops.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Okina Mask
img.alt: okina mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: witchs_glintstone_crown_helmet_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: witchs glintstone crown helmet elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Obtained by progressing in Sorceress Sellen's Questline.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Alberich's Pointed Hat (Altered)
img.alt: alberichs pointed hat (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Pointed Hat if you have it in your possession.

img.title: Banished Knight Altered (Helm)
img.alt: banished knight helm (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Stormveil Castle. Looted from the Banished Knight located next to the Chapel in the northwest section, where Sorcerer Rogier is located.
Boc the Seamster can alter the original Banished Knight Helm, if you have it in your possession.

img.title: Black Dumpling
img.alt: black dumpling elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Raises attack when the wearer suffers from madness

ul.li: Dropped by the enemies found at Volcano Manor who wear it.

img.title: Black Hood
img.alt: black hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Black Wolf Mask
img.alt: black wolf mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Found behind Seluvis's Rise, reached by running and jumping up the crumbling part of the wall near the entrance to the tower.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Blackguard's Iron Mask
img.alt: blackguards iron mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart upon defeat.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Blue Festive Hood
img.alt: blue festive hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by the blue clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village.

a.title: Elden Ring Blue Silver Mail Hood

img.title: Blue Silver Mail Hood
img.alt: blue silver mail hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.
One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

img.title: Brave's Cord Circlet
img.alt: braves cord circlet elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Currently unavailable

img.title: Brave's Leather Helm
img.alt: braves leather helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Currently unobtainable.

img.title: Cleanrot Helm (Altered)
img.alt: cleanrot helm (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Cleanrot Helm into Cleanrot Helm (Altered).

img.title: Commoner's Headband (Altered)
img.alt: commoners headband (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.
The non-altered Commoner's Headband is looted from a specific corpse and neither piece can be altered by the player.

img.title: Confessor Hood (Altered)
img.alt: confessor hood (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Confessor Hood into Confessor Hood (Altered).

img.title: consorts_mask_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: consorts mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: crimson_tear_scarab_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: crimson tear scarab elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but increases damage taken.

ul.li:
On a rooftop at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Cuckoo Knight Helm
img.alt: cuckoo knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three near the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

img.title: Depraved Perfumer Headscarf
img.alt: depraved perfumer headscarf elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

img.title: Diallos's Mask
img.alt: dialloss mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.

Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Drake Knight Helm
img.alt: drake knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The entire Drake Knight Set is found in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Roof site of Grace, kill both Stormhawks you see first, then descend the ladder. Look left from the bottom of the ladder and drop down onto a balcony. Follow the path and circle around the tower to find the set in a chest. [Elden Ring Map here]

img.title: Drake Knight Helm (Altered)
img.alt: drake knight helm (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Drake Knight Helm if you have it in your possession.

img.title: Duelist Helm
img.alt: duelist helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes

ul.li: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

img.title: Eccentric's Hood (Altered)
img.alt: eccentrics hood (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Eccentric's Hood into Eccentric's Hood (Altered).

img.title: Envoy Crown
img.alt: envoy crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace, on a corpse at the southern tip of the thicker right branch.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Festive Hood
img.alt: festive hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped from the yellow clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village

img.title: Festive Hood (Altered)
img.alt: festive hood (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Obtained by altering Festive Hood at a site of grace or via Boc the Seamster.

img.title: Fire Prelate Helm
img.alt: fire prelate helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Dropped by Fire Prelates, found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir or in the Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

img.title: Foot Soldier Helm
img.alt: foot soldier helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: It can be farmed at Caelid. Starting from the grace Chamber Outside the Plaza in Redmane Castle, go south and there will be four foot soldiers wearing the helm.

a.title: Elden Ring Gilded Foot Soldier Cap

img.title: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
img.alt: gilded foot soldier cap elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Chance to drop from Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

img.title: Godskin Noble Hood
img.alt: godskin noble hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
The Grass Hair Ornament Helm is currently unavailable in-game.

img.title: Greathood
img.alt: greathood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel slightly south of Castle Sol to the Snow Valley Ruins Overlook. From there, head for the nearby bridge, where a ghost of a painter can be found. Speak to the painter to receive the Greathood.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Guardian Mask
img.alt: guardian mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

img.title: Haima Glintstone Crown
img.alt: haima glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.
The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link

img.title: Haligtree Knight Helm
img.alt: haligtree knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Looted from a corpse located near the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. It is in the room at the top of the ladder directly adjacent to the grace site.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: High Page Hood
img.alt: high page hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.

The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.
They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

img.title: Iji's Mirrorhelm
img.alt: ijis mirrorhelm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

img.title: Iron Kasa
img.alt: iron kasa elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Acquired by following Yura's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: jar_elden_ring_wiki_guide_200px
img.alt: jar elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Boosts the power of throwing pot items

ul.li:
Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
img.alt: lazuli glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: See the location on the Elden Ring Map here.
Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.

img.title: Leyndell Soldier Helm
img.alt: leyndell soldier helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

img.title: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
img.alt: lusats glintstone crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Increases the power of Stars of Ruin, Increases all FP consumption

ul.li:
Lusat's Glintstone Crown can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Malenia's Winged Helm
img.alt: malenias winged helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella

img.title: Night's Cavalry Helm
img.alt: nights cavalry helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

img.title: Night's Cavalry Helm (Altered)
img.alt: nights cavalry helm (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Helm, if you have it in your possession.

img.title: Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau
img.alt: nomadic merchants chapeau elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
After defeating Mohg, the Omen, open the secret passage behind the altar and journey into the mass grave. The full Nomadic Merchant's Set is found behind the first breakable tent you can see. Break the tent by baiting out a Frenzy attack from the Nomad there.
[Elden Ring Map here]

img.title: Nox Monk Hood
img.alt: nox monk hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be looted from the Nox Priest common enemies in Nokstella, Eternal City.

img.title: Nox Monk Hood (Altered)
img.alt: nox monk hood (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Hood into Nox Monk Hood (Altered).

img.title: Nox Swordstress Crown
img.alt: nox swordstress crown elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.
Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

img.title: Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered)
img.alt: nox swordstress crown (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Crown into Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered).

img.title: Old Aristocrat Cowl
img.alt: old aristocrat cowl elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.
There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.
Altus Plateau- There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

img.title: Omen Helm
img.alt: omen helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn

ul.li:
The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Radahn Soldier Helm
img.alt: radahn soldier helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.
Elden Ring Map Here

img.title: Ragged Hat
img.alt: ragged hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Not currently obtainable.

img.title: Ragged Hat (Altered)
img.alt: ragged hat (altered) elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The Ragged Hat (Altered) Helm is currently unobtainable.

img.title: Raya Lucarian Helm
img.alt: raya lucarian helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

img.title: Redmane Knight Helm
img.alt: redmane knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Royal Knight Helm
img.alt: royal knight helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Royal Knight Loretta for 4000.

img.title: Royal Remains Helm
img.alt: royal remains helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced

ul.li: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

img.title: Sacred Crown Helm
img.alt: sacred crown helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
Drops from the ballista soldiers just outside of the Elpheal Inner Wall site of Grace.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Sanguine Noble Hood
img.alt: sanguine noble hood elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Skeletal Mask
img.alt: skeletal mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
he Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
img.alt: spellblades pointed hat elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%

ul.li: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

img.title: Tree Sentinel Helm
img.alt: tree sentinel helm elden ring wiki guide 200px

ul.li:
The entire Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by destroying all three chariots in the Auriza Hero's Grave.
Elden Ring Map here

img.title: White Mask
img.alt: white mask elden ring wiki guide 200px

tr.td: Slightly raises attack power (10% for 20s) when there is blood loss nearby

ul.li: The entire War Surgeon Set is obtained after defeating all three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.
